title: 12/30/20 - HOUR-2 - What Should The Bears Do With Mitch Trubisky?
itunes:title: 12/30/20 - HOUR-2 - What Should The Bears Do With Mitch Trubisky?
description:
Colin explains the issue the Bears are facing with QB Mitch Trubisky as they battle to make the postseason in Week 17. He also talks about Green Bay quarterback Aaron Rodgers admitting he wants to win the MVP this season and what that tells you about the greatest athletes of all time. Colin talks to Cowboys insider Matt Mosley about the Cowboys suddenly finding success at the end of the season. Former NFL running back Rashad Jennings also joins the show in this hour.

 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
